Cover Art
Ancient Stones
2021 Winner: Chesley Award for Best Cover: Magazine
Francesca Resta is an Italian illustrator based in London, UK. Her love for fantasy and science fiction novels drives her art and she paints digital illustrations for book covers for US and Italian publishers such as Penguin/Putnam, Simon and Schuster, Sourcebooks, Mondadori and Giunti.
